name: VARIANT_GENES
description: This table stores gene data for variant results.

columns.name: VARIANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the variant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: GENE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of a gene associated with the variant record.

columns.name: GENE_ID_RECORD_SYMBOL
columns.description: The current symbol for this gene. In cases of disagreement, the current HGNC symbol will be used.
